name: A Boat Full
description: A Boat Full is a game that I created for my final major project, as 1 person over the course of 8 weeks. A Boat Full is a top down 2D trading game in which you play as a merchant with your own ship, and sail the seas visiting ports at islands and landmasses to buy and sell items in the hopes for a profit. The games world is made up of a simple pixel art tile map and small sprites. The game has a map feature, and the shops stock is generated randomly from a range. The shops refresh on a minute rotation so they are always different and never get sold out for long.
